name: Birth of a Hunter
description: Birth of a Hunter is a metroidvania style 2D platformer, with the twist that a huge new map is generated every time you start a new game.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or greater Processor: Intel or AMD Dual Core CPU or greater Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 4000 or greater DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 70 MB available space
